author: Michael C. Bender, Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump Mobilizes the White House to Tackle Coronavirus but Adds to the ‘Fog of War’ - The Wall Street Journal
description: Trump Mobilizes the White House to Tackle Coronavirus but Adds to the ‘Fog of War’ The Wall Street Journal Experts and Trump’s advisers doubt White House’s 240,000 coronavirus deaths estimate The Washington Post Trump resists a nationwide stay-at-home order. …
content:
WASHINGTONAs the coronavirus pandemic sweeps the U.S., President Trump has put the government on what officials describe as a war footing.
He has ordered private companies to manufacture supplies, deployed parts of the military, restricted travel, led daily … [+84 chars]
